name: S.P.E.A.R
description:
This game was made for a game competition a couple months ago but I thought it was worth adding to it :). The game is just about getting the 8 keys in the time limit, and escaping. You'll need to change gravity to be able to get them all though!

The second update of this game includes multiple improvements over the first:

- keys now visible on minimap 

- key counter (instead of score counter) 

- jumping on ground (and double jumping) is added 

- bug fixes (changing gravity into walls, jumping on ceiling and fall damage not working correct now all fixed) 

- menu screen doesnt lag after few minutes

- when playing again after completing the game doesnt crash

The next update will have:

- better sprites for zinc

- coins, or collectables

- enemies and powerups

- attacks? 

- save data, keeping best score
